Well... I will find this game addicting.  But with many servers, strict rules, and some servers that make you feel unwelcomed... it still is a good game.  I personaly like rooms with the kreig 550 due to multi-shot type sniper with no reload after each shot.  It is fun, but sometimes I feel unwelcomed due to some of the rooms.
Btw... You might wanna buy this game on a sale... price is ok, game is great, but overall is descent.

[h1]Overview[/h1]
I picked up this game in a bundle deal that came with Garry's Mod, and I'm loving it! I was just getting it so I could play Garry's Mod with the Counter-Strike textures and maps, but I totally under-estimated it. It's very fun to play with friends, as you can easily set up a server and invite a friend. It's also great for playing alone, even without internet, because you can set up bots with a custom difficulty to play. I like the variety, as well. The maps are terrific.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
‣ Easy Server Setup (LAN Servers)
‣ Offline Bots w/ Varying Difficulties
‣ Diverse Maps
‣ Multiplayer

[h1]Cons[/h1]
‣ Unrealism (to a point)
‣ Hefty price for the amount of content

[h1]Final Thoughts[/h1]
Very good all around game. In my opinion, this game is definitely worth the money, and hopefully you'll feel the same way.
